a machine connected to a computer that prints onto paper using ink: a laser printer
A printer is also a person whose job is to print material.
Add to word list
Add to word list
IT a piece of equipment used for printing documents and images, that is connected to a computer: a color/high-speed printer
a person or company whose job is to print books, newspapers, or other documents: We are a commercial printer offering pre-press, printing, and bindery services. The book is now at the printers. See also
bubble jet printer
dot matrix printer
inkjet printer
laser printer
security printer
